import React from 'react' import { ModalHeader, ModalDescription, ModalContent, ModalActions, Button, Header, Image, Modal, } from 'semantic-ui-react' function DetailsModal({ component, isOpen }) { const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(isOpen) return ( setOpen(false)} onOpen={() => setOpen(true)} open={open} trigger={component} > Select a Photo
